name: Escape (itch) (Som4body)
description:
Creators

Controls

Movement: 

     o WASD / Arrow Keys

     o Controller - Left Thumbstick 

Aiming: 

     o Mouse

     o Right Thumbstick 

Healing: 

     o Spacebar

     o Right Bumper 

Hostile Bullets:

     o Left Click

     o Right Trigger

Stun Bullets:

     o Right Click

     o Left Trigger
